item.title: Comment on [Software Review] – Stellar Phoenix Windows Data Recovery by Eric Methu
item.dc:creator: Eric Methu
item.description: Worked so fine for me... The tool is great and i have recovered about 1 TB data from my WD Passport external hard drive....
item.content:encoded: Worked so fine for me… The tool is great and i have recovered about 1 TB data from my WD Passport external hard drive….

item.title: Comment on [Software Review] – Stellar Phoenix Windows Data Recovery by Andy
item.dc:creator: Andy
item.description: Few day's back i had lost some of my files i.e. photos, documents, emails, etc. and i was looking for the data recovery software on Google. Then i found your post where you have recommended Stellar Windows data recovery software. I downloaded this software and got everything back which i had lost. The software is really very good to recover the deleted files from the storage devices. Happy to have such an amazing tool.
item.content:encoded: Few day’s back i had lost some of my files i.e. photos, documents, emails, etc. and i was looking for the data recovery software on Google. Then i found your post where you have recommended Stellar Windows data recovery software. I downloaded this software and got everything back which i had lost. The software is really very good to recover the deleted files from the storage devices. Happy to have such an amazing tool.

item.title: Comment on [Software Review] – Stellar Phoenix Windows Data Recovery by Tom
item.dc:creator: Tom
item.description: Thanks buddy for sharing such a nice tool. I have downloaded this software for recovering my lost data and successfully recovered all my files. Thanks again buddy for sharing such a nice Windows data recovery software.
item.content:encoded: Thanks buddy for sharing such a nice tool. I have downloaded this software for recovering my lost data and successfully recovered all my files. Thanks again buddy for sharing such a nice Windows data recovery software.
